tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE audit_trail (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    action VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE audit_trail (
    audit_id INT,
    action VARCHAR,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    user_id INT,
    table_affected VARCHAR,
    PRIMARY KEY (audit_id)
);

CREATE TABLE votes (
  vote_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  voter_id INT,
  candidate_id INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (voter_id) REFERENCES voters(voter_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (candidate_id) REFERENCES candidates(candidate_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Election (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
started_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
ended_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL);

CREATE TABLE Voter (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
age INT NOT NULL,
registered_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL);

CREATE TABLE Vote (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
voter_id INT NOT NULL,
election_id INT NOT NULL,
vote_option VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
voted_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL);

CREATE TABLE AuditTrail (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
table_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
row_id INT NOT NULL,
action VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
action_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
user_id INT NOT NULL);

CREATE TABLE User (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
password VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
role VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL);
